question: You have recently started work in a new company. Write a letter to an English speaking friend. In your letter explain why you changed jobs describe your new job tell him/her your other news.
text: I hope you are healthy and safe. Today I am writing this letter to inform you that, I have switched my job to another organisation this, I want to share reasons behind this.

To embark with, as you know earlier I worked in a private company as an accountant. In addition, I had to work hard and my colleagues were not Cooperative. Moreover, I had to do overtime without any paying money. Not only at the office  but also at home I had to do work. It was really a difficult task for me.

Furthermore, currently, I am doing a job in a private bank, as a manager post. Though it has many responsibilities, I am very happy with my present profession as it is related to my academic background. I think I will do better in this Sector. I will not leave any stone unturned to get success.

However, my colleagues are very well behaved and they are not egoistic. I am very excited about my work. It was my dream, that I will do a job in a bank. Over and above, my parents also feel proud of me. I am feeling like I am over the moon.
I hope you will feel delighted by seeing my progress. Hope to see you soon. No more today, please visit my place if you can.
